original_text: but to sit at my right hand or at my left is not mine to grant, but it is for those for whom it has been prepared.”
korean_text: 내 좌우편에 앉는 것은 내가 줄 것이 아니라 누구를 위하여 준비되었든지 그들이 얻을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: but to sit at my right hand or at my left
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내 오른편이나 왼편에 앉는 것은

sentences.original_text: for whom it has been prepared.
